DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine : - The safety study medication side effect might associate ; - Whether study medication help patient low level 'good ' cholesterol ( HDL-C ) high blood fat triglyceride ( TG ) ; - How much study medication give patient ; - How study medication compare fenofibrate ( Lofibra ) , drug use people low level HDL-C high level TG .
DOC.brief_title: A Study People With Abnormal Fat Levels Blood
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 80 year age People abnormal fat level blood ( low HDL , high TG ) People diabetes People whose blood pressure great 160/95 mm Hg , blood pressure medicine People frequent chest pain unstable angina , heart attack heart procedure , include stent placement , within past 3 month
